## AUDIO MERGING MODULE


Uses FFMPEG to combine multiple audio files into one 

















































Can only work in self hosted n8n with ffmpeg installed. You cannot install the library on n8n cloud
```json
ffmpeg -y -f concat -safe 0 -i /tmp/concat_list.txt \
-c copy /tmp/final_merged.mp3
``
